portfolios.name: Budgety
portfolios.details: Budgety is a budget controller Web Application. Here you can control your budget very easily. Here are nicely decorated income list and expense list. This is very user comfortable Web Application with a beautiful UI interface..

portfolios.name: Audio Player
portfolios.details: Custom Audio Player is a simple audio player Web Application. Here you can listen music very easily. You can control your music very easy away. This is very user comfortable audio listening Web Application with a beautiful UI interface.

portfolios.name: Exchanger
portfolios.details: Exchanger is a money rate exchanging Web Application. Here you can easily calculate any kind of money with present exchanging rate. This is very user comfortable Web Application with a beautiful UI interface

portfolios.name: Form Validation
portfolios.details: With this application you can learn how to validate a web form. This is a very simple form validation application.

portfolios.details: Hang-man is a wonderful web based game. The rule is Guess the correct word & win the game. This is a learnable Web Based Game with a beautiful UI interface.
